product_name: Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump
long_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump features a machined steel barrel and piston, a varnished wood handle and an aluminum base. Barrel is treated with a substantial matte paint job to achieve a finish that is both durable and stylish. Flip-Thread chuck threads directly onto Presta or Schrader valves for a secure, airtight connection. Air bleed system cleverly eliminates chance of accidentally unthreading a removable Presta valve; also lets you adjust tire pressure when inflating via Schrader valves. Included Speed Chuck makes this pump compatible with disc wheels. Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump has a maximum inflation pressure of 160 psi (11 bars).
short_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump features a machined steel barrel and piston, a varnished wood handle and an aluminum base.
